groupreservations.title: Group Reservation Form
groupreservations.intro: Thank you for your interest in a group reservation! Please read the important information below before filling out the form.

content.capacity: The private room has a minimum capacity of 10 people and a maximum capacity of 20 people, and the rooftop terrace has a maximum capacity of 25 people.
content.terrace: The terrace is heated, covered, and equipped with custom curtains.
content.service1: 1st seating: 5:30 PM to 8:00 PM (table must be vacated by 8:00 PM)
content.note: Reservations for the terrace cannot be moved indoors.

menuAndPrices.title: Menu and Prices
menuAndPrices.description: We offer a fixed 3-course menu composed of our classics (pizzas, seafood, salads, seasonal vegetables, meats, etc., depending on availability). There are 3 menu options to choose from, prices per person.

options.name: Menu #1
options.items: Salads, buffarela, broccoli, meatballs, tomato and white sauce pizzas, desserts of the moment.

options.name: Menu #2
options.items: Salads, squid, broccoli, pasta, tomato and white sauce pizzas, desserts of the moment.

options.name: Menu #3
options.items: Oysters, crudo, shrimp (seafood platter), buffarela, meatballs, pasta, tomato and white sauce pizzas, desserts of the moment.

note.title: Notes:
options: No menu modifications can be made less than 24 hours before the reservation.

restrictionsAndConditions.title: Restrictions and Important Conditions
points: Our kitchen uses a lot of dairy and gluten. Gluten-free options are possible but very limited.
No outside food or drinks allowed (including birthday cakes). Our homemade desserts are delicious!
Children are not allowed in group reservations.
Cancellations less than 12 hours in advance will incur full food charges for absentees. Please confirm your group as early as possible.
Kitchen opens at 5:30 PM, last order at 10:15 PM.
We do not accept terrace reservations outside the group framework.

formFields.disclaimer: I have read and accept the above conditions.

notes.confirmation: Reservation is only confirmed after administrative validation.
notes.responseTime: You will receive a response within 24 to 48 hours to confirm availability.

callToAction.description: A cozy Montreal spot serving comforting Italo-American-inspired dishes, great wines, and a nostalgic vibe. Proudly located on Plaza St-Hubert—easy to reach and open to everyone.

groupBookingInfo.roomPreviewCaption: Spacious and private – available for groups of 7 or more. Perfect for team outings, birthdays, and more.
groupBookingInfo.schedule: Two time slots are available: the first seating at 5:30 PM (the table must be vacated by 8:00 PM), or the second seating at 8:30 PM (until closing time).
groupBookingInfo.largeGroups: For groups of at least 7 people , please email us — we have a cozy private room available !
groupBookingInfo.glutenFree: We offer some gluten-free options, but please note that our menu is small and limited.
groupBookingInfo.outsideFood: No outside food or drink is allowed — including cakes (we make our own delicious desserts!).
groupBookingInfo.kitchenHours: Our kitchen opens at 5:30 PM and last call is at 10:15 PM.
groupBookingInfo.terrace: We do not take reservations for the terrace.
groupBookingInfo.read: I have read and I accept the terms.

groupBookingReservation.title: Reservation Confirmation
groupBookingReservation.description: Once your request has been submitted, the reservation will not be confirmed until a member of our team follows up with you. We will contact you to review the details and officially confirm the reservation.
groupBookingReservation.note: Please note that this is a request and not a confirmed reservation.
